title: 180 37 "Showdown in the Ancient Ruins! Sky God Eneru's Goal!"Transliteration: "Kodai iseki no taiketsu! Goddo Eneru no mokuteki" (Japanese:古代遺跡の対決!神·エネルの目的) Yukio Kaizawa Junki Takegami February 8, 2004(2004-02-08)[57] November 19, 2008
transformers_text: 180 37 Showdown in the Ancient Ruins Sky God En eru's Goal Transliteration Kodai is eki no t aike tsu God do En eru no mok ute ki Japanese Yukio Kai z awa Junk i Take gam i February 8 2004 2004 02 08 57 November 19 2008 En eru counterattacks Gan Fall and lands a finishing hit He then knocks out Robin as she tries to manipulate him Zoro impresses En eru with his power but is easily beaten while trying to make him pay for what he did to Robin but it takes Wy per with a secret weapon to take En eru down
